Entity

Class Menu

  • java.lang.Object
    • Entity.Menu

  • public class Menu
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents the room service menu of the hotel The menu can have multiple items
    Since:
    2018-04-01
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    TeamFour

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String FILENAME
      The filename for saving the entire room service Menu
      static java.lang.String SEPARATOR
      The separator for separating fields to be saved into the file

      Menu()
      Creates a new Menu The Menu is read from the file
